### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payment_reports (
    report_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    payment_amount DECIMAL,
    payment_date TIMESTAMP,
    payment_method VARCHAR(50),
    product_id UUID
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE payment_reports SET payment_amount = 100.00 WHERE report_id = 'e2897856-501c-4b66-9dc0-5ac5e1a91038';

### TABLEDATA

CREATE TABLE payment_reports (
 payment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 user_id UUID,
 payment_amount DECIMAL,
 payment_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE user_spending (
 user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 total_spent DECIMAL,
 last_purchase_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE product_sales (
 product_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 product_name VARCHAR,
 total_sales INT,
 price DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE product_reviews (
 review_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 product_id UUID,
 user_id UUID,
 rating INT,
 review_text TEXT
)

### STATEMENT

UPDATE payment_reports SET payment_amount = 100.50 WHERE payment_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
